title: Hantu Kak Limah
synopsis: When Kak Limah turns up dead shortly after her marriage to a much younger man, her pesky ghost haunts the villagers, who can't seem to get rid of her.

title: Ustaz, Mu Tunggu Aku Datang!
synopsis: Two shiftless friends embrace religion and embark on a trip to find a famous missionary but their spiritual journey comes with unique challenges.

title: Adnan Sempit 3
synopsis: Silly street biker Adnan returns with first-time challenges -- running his own business, being a husband and learning how to juggle it all.

title: Aku Terima Nikahnya
synopsis: After an accident leaves her husband with selective amnesia, a pained wife works to restore his memory of her and their once unshakable bond.

title: Highland Tower
synopsis: Two decades after a high-rise building collapsed and killed many, a TV host tries to make a documentary on-site until strange, disturbing events occur.
